p:
The genome size of coronaviruses varies between 26 and 32 kb with four major structural genes encoding the membrane glycoprotein (M), spike protein (S), nucleocapsid protein (N), and a small membrane protein (SM) (Figure 2). An additional membrane glycoprotein (HE) occurs in the HCoV‐OC43 and HKU1 beta‐coronaviruses.
12
